Detailed Description

Base64 encode and decode function. 

 gaia::security::Base64 base;
 unsigned char *pEncoded = NULL, *pDecoded = NULL;
 pEncoded = base.encode(pInput, strlen((char*)pInput));
 pDecoded = base.decode(pEncoded,strlen((char*)pEncoded));
